name: Finance Norway
goal:
Finance Norway is the industry organisation for the financial industry in Norway. We represent about 250 financial companies with around 50,000 employees.

Through dialogue and analysis, Finance Norway works to ascertain the best prerequisites for the functioning of the financial sector.

We work to increase confidence in the industry and contribute to the safe and efficient operation.

Our member companies are savings banks, commercial banks, life insurance companies, general insurance companies and financial groups.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Information Society, Internal Market
euInitiatives: Finance Norway works with the whole width of Financial legislation. We are also engaged in climate change, traffic, motor, health, accounting, sustainability etc
